title: Rust Mutability Ownership Demonstration
description: In this lab, the mutability of data is demonstrated through Rust programming language by showcasing how ownership and mutability can be changed when a box is moved from an immutable state to a mutable state.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Mutability | Ownership
meta.description: Explore the mutability of data in Rust programming through an introduction to ownership and mutability concepts.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, Mutability, Ownership, Data Structures

verify.name: This step has no verification at the moment

i18n.title: Rust 可变性所有权演示
i18n.description: 在本实验中，通过Rust编程语言展示了数据的可变性，即当一个盒子从不可变状态移动到可变状态时，所有权和可变性是如何变化的。

meta.title: Rust编程 | 可变性 | 所有权
meta.description: 通过介绍所有权和可变性概念，探索Rust编程中数据的可变性。
meta.keywords: Rust,编程,可变性,所有权,数据结构
